Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes an optional twenty-five year retirement plan for uniformed court officers and peace officers employed by the unified court system
Summary: Authorizes an optional twenty-five year retirement plan for uniformed court officers and peace officers employed by the unified court system.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to authorizing an optional twenty-five year retirement plan for uniformed court officers and peace officers employed by the unified court system
